deployment_relevant_files: Dockerfile (containerizes shaded JAR; uses openjdk:19; runs App.jar)
README.md (describes running on AWS ECS and pushing to ECR; references terraform but no terraform files present in repo)
architectural_resources: Container runtime/orchestrator (intended AWS ECS per README)
Logging (intended AWS CloudWatch Logs per README)
MongoDB Atlas cluster/database (external managed MongoDB; uses MONGODB_URI env var; authMechanism=MONGODB-AWS per README)
AWS IAM role for task execution / MongoDB AWS auth integration (execution_role_arn referenced in README)
Networking: VPC subnets and security groups (referenced in README terraform.tfvars example)
